1.content:
You are roughly 1/8 an inch tall for this scenario. This makes you roughly the size of a small ant, and are as such, little more than a speck in the eyes of the giant girls who you are about to meet. Take caution! (Or dont.. )

Remember, your ultimate goal is discovery! Getting discovered by the harvesters potentially gives you a paradise!! Although; as many fans of this world know, unaware is also a sort of fantasy.
Choose wisely and enjoy!
1.title: Big Information

choices: You go in; deciding that you're safer inside.
You wait till 11; figuring the Harvester's activity will die down a bit
You wait till 3: assuming most of them will be gone by then
You wait until 3 am: wanting to be completely sure they are gone or asleep
11.content:
You are the size of a speck of dust. Luckily for you, you happened to have your phone and clothes on you upon what the women scientists are calling the "mass shrink" incident. According to your phone's map; you are standing just outside the semi-secret "Harv" house; the only one in this city. It is essentially a hotel-like, 3 story tall building in the middle of several other high rises. It has several painted on symbols that appear as silver hands holding a little golden man with hearts all around. This is the place.
You are well aware of what you have to do to reach your happy ending. You simply need to speak with the "Harv Boss" and strike the deal; promise to assist with operation repopulate, and they will promise to keep you safe.
The news has been running wild with stories of increased fervor in the Extractor movement; making you finally reach out to the Harvesters. Every day up this point, stories of "full crevice" searches and "heavy stompings" by the Extractors has made you fearful to be out and about, scavenging for food. This is your fantasy, living in a world of gigantic women, but you don't want to die before you can fully enjoy it.

With your size, the crack under the back door is as tall as a 2 story building. Extremely easy to fit through. You hear various sounds and rumblings coming from within; no doubt the activity of the Harvesters going about their day. The time is 9:00 a.m.
You'd rather enter sooner than later; but also don't want to be crushed by the numerous Harvesters inside.
11.title: Small beginnings

111.content:
You go in; and enter a back hallway. You appear to be in the laundry room. There are 2 washers and 2 dryers; all running. You can't hear a thing besides them. As you walk by them, you stop in front of a bin of clothes. After a quick whiff; you realize these are the dirty panties and undergarments of one of the girls who's favorite color seems to be yellow. You approach the door on the other end of the short hallway; the sounds of the washer and dryers drowning out all others.

You walk up to the next door; go under it without hesitation; as it is the same space as before, and are now in a common room.
There are several couches, 2 long coffee tables, 4 comfy chairs and several desks all situated near the center of the room save the desks which are near the edge.
The capacity of this room is enormous; there are many giantesses here; having morning coffee, tea, and various energy drinks; getting ready for the day, and having various conversations. You begin to wonder if you should've waited. There is a door-sized arch-way across the room. Judging on the layout of the common area; you assume its the kicthen. Hearing your stomach grumble; you are inclined to make your way there and have a nice crumb meal. But first things first. you look at your phone; on it you have a picture of the "Harv Boss". She is a tall,very white (almost pale), black haired girl. Next to her you see several other girls, including some you see in this room. You don't see the Harv Boss however. The names aren't loading however. Though at your size; you doubt they;d hear you at all.
There are several giantesses on the couches, as well as in the desks. The area between the closest part of the couch to the kitchen and the kitchen itself is constantly congested with foot traffic.
Awkwardly enough; there are 2 open doors parallel to that space; meaning that even if you were to shimmy along the wall on either side; you would still have to cross a stretch of space of considerable distance. At your size; it seems like a Central Park from here.
You think for a moment. You could shimmy along the wall anyway; and end up having to sprint across the open hallway, or make a dash for the nearest chair; after which you would navigate your way to the couch.
With your size, making a dash for the chair seems safer; since that will get you out of the open and under some much needed protection.
111.title: You go in; deciding that you're safer inside.

1111.content:
You shimmy along the wall, not really too interested in getting yourself in direct danger of foot traffic just yet. As you walk along the wall, You hear and feel a giantess's footsteps approaching. Marina, the 5'7" light brown-haired soccer powerhouse approaches. Her pretty, tanned, athletic legs with orange toe-nailed feet make their way to the laundry room with a large basket in tow quick and purposefully. Well out of her way, you can admire her rapidly approaching, gorgeous, powerful body.

You get around the side of the room real easy this way, hearing and feeling many giantess's footfalls, but never in danger from any of them. You turn the corner, staying along the wall. As you continue, you approach the many shoes of the girls who live here; you deduce that barefoot must be the house rule. Some are lined up neatly, others carelessly thrown. As you shimmy along, you approach a sandal whose heel is flat against the wall. You will have to go around or over. The sandal does seem to be rather easy to climb, though the entire area, and especially near the sandal, smells intensely female and stinky. You can hardly imagine just how the flat of the sandal must smell, let alone feel, being continually crushed by a giantess all day. This sandal is in the middle of this shoe depot, which is next to what seems like a major entryway as the door is heavy looking, and solid black.
Its honestly a bit overwhelming; seeing all these shoes and sandals here. There really is quite the number of girls here judging by the shoe depot's size.
1111.title: Shimmy along the wall

11111.content:
You clamber up and over the sandal, overwhelmed with thoughts of just how massive the girl whose foot goes here must be, and how she must look. It doesn't take long, and you chuckle at the thought of how much longer it would've taken to go around. You pass through the shoe depot with no more incident and are halfway past the door when you hear booms coming from outside of it.
! Too far to make it to the other side in time and somewhat in the open, you drop prone next to the door sill, taking advantage of your small size, you are almost entirely in the tiny door sill's shadow, and seemingly protected.
11111.title: Over the sandal

choices: Stay a while. As you've seen, this place definetely protects enough.
Continue your roundabout way to the kitchen.
111111.content:
The booms begin to intensify, the force increases so extremely you are forced to lie there, in the shadow of the door sill. Still, the booms grow louder and more frequent, until literally all you can hear is the thundering of the approaching goddesses.
The door flies open, and a brown sandal with hearts on the bottom passes over you, thooming intensely. Booms not stopping, Heather, the 5'8 blonde heart breaker passes over you, followed directly by Monica, the 5'7 Indian happy-go-lucky beauty, and Mercedes, the 5'10, pot smoking Latina goddess. Monica's white sneakers and Mercedes big black boots are far louder than Heather's sandals.

The booms briefly cease, and you catch the words from Mercedes "Yeah I'm still going too, but relax I'll be safe about it." before the booms resume, with the action of Heather flipping off her Sandals. "Ugh fine" Heather says, beginning to boom away, her golden heels passing close enough to knock you down were you standing. You feel her stomping away long after she turns the corner in anger.
Monica uses her other foot to take off her shoe, then her socked foot to take off the other, while Mercedes leans down and unzips her shin high boots. These cause minor booms, and you can still hear what they say. "Ugh she can be such a bitch" Mercedes says, her accent seemingly Argentinian. "Just don't let her get to you, and hey, I wouldn't mind a toke later." Monica replies, before they both rise.
"Alright" Mercedes smiles.
They both begin to walk away, Monica in white socks, faded, dirty, and smelly, and Mercedes in black ones, thin and worn out, revealing her powerful but feminine arches.
111111.title: Continue..

11112.content: For some reason or another, you decide to take the long way around. As you pass around the front of the sandal, you take note of the toe depressions, shuddering at the thought of becoming a smear under them. Booms begin eminating from the door, much louder suddenly and deeper. Still in the middle of the shoe depot, you helplessly stare up at the door and hope for the best.
11112.title: Around the sandal

111121.content:
The booms begin to intensify, the force increases so extremely you are forced to lie there, next to the sandal you went around, essentially protected only by the fact that you are so small and close to the edge of this sandal.Still, the booms grow louder and more frequent, until literally all you can hear is the thundering of the approaching goddesses.
The door flies open, and Heather, the 5'8 blonde heart breaker, Monica, the 5'7 Indian happy-go-lucky beauty, and Mercedes, the 5'10, pot smoking Latina goddess stomp into view, Monica's white sneakers and Mercedes big black boots are far louder than Heather's sandals.

Despite this, Heather's brown sandal with hearts on the bottom comes extremely close, booming so massively you feel it in your bones. This girl is a stomping force of nature, to be sure, you think, as her well developed calf muscles shift. The booms briefly cease as she stands directly over you, and you catch the words from Mercedes "Yeah I'm still going too, but relax I'll be safe about it." before the booms resume, as Heather kicks the pair of sandals you went around, presumably making room for her own. "Ugh fine" Heather says, as her gigantic sandal quickly comes over you. A faded brown heart is the last thing you see as she stomps you with incredible force, your body instantly flattened by her unyielding power.
The stomp has so much force bits of your body become embedded in the heart shape in the dead center of her sandal, forever to be pulverized wherever she goes. She angrily stomps away from the others, unaware of the extremely brutal death she gave you.
111121.title: Continue

Enter a plain flat (a short solid black shoe with no laces)
Enter a slip-on (a medium height colored shoe with no laces and flowery designs)

There are certain amazing fantasies you cannot resist, and decide they must be fulfilled here and now.

Marina, the 5'7" light brown-haired soccer powerhouse approaches. 11121.content:
The deafening boom of the giantess's footsteps throw you off balance as you leap forward with all your might. As you leave the ground with much less speed than you hoped for, you realize it wouldn't have made a difference; her foot is too massive. As her sole comes down on you, you react and turn; and see it happen almost in slow motion as the ridges and imperfections in her feet make contact and the immense weight turns you into paste.
Her foot is so massive and the unaware stomp has so much force you are nothing more than a smear on her foot, blending in with the rest.
Your body is crushed endlessly and forever by her; some piece of you buried deep in-between the ridges of her foot.

Marina feels nothing whatsoever as she steps on you; and goes about her business.

You don't waste any more time, and begin running as fast your miniscule legs can carry you to the safety of the chair. Getting a hold of yourself, you take your time catching your breath. You were almost pulverized by a sexy mountain after all. Looking out from under the the chair you see it is next the loveseat which is perpendicular to the longer 4 seater couch. At the end of this; you see the gap between the couch and the kitchen. There are several giantesses sitting on the couch, and one on the love seat.

The distance between the couch and the chair's edge is about a football field length away to you; though there appears to be minimal risk of being spotted or stepped on. Seeing as the couches are flush to each-other; making this little dash will lead to a straight shot to the edge of the couch closest the kitchen. As a plus; you'll get to see a bunch of giantess feet, on the way, though after your encounter, you are hoping your future self is more cautious.

After spending some time admiring them; you get over to the edge of the couch; the distance is much larger than you thought from here. Traffic appears to have cleared; for the moment.
111231.title: Make the dash

1112311.content:
Without hesitation; you book it across the way.
At about halfway there you hear rumbling of an approaching giantess; only it sounds much louder than before despite the fact that you can not see the giantess herself.

Cassandra, the 5'10" volleyball playing gorgeous blonde turns into the kitchen from the opposite hallway, dashing.
You have no time to react this time; in 2 steps she directly in front of you. Her third step is on you.
You are quickly and instantly crushed under her heel as she dashes to get her shoes at the door.

Cassandra absolutely cannot miss her interview. She grabs someone's pair of sandals instead and books it outside; your crumpled body left splattered smack in the middle of the space between the couch and the kicthen.

As you see the the earthquake inducing mountain-sized girls rise to their full cloud level height, you fear this may be the end...

11123121.content:
You turn around and stand there, crouching as you did against Marina. The giantesses rise and begin walking towards you, the force of their legs and feet impacting the ground is tremendous.

The leggy all American sweet-heart, Helena, passes you, her massive, nearly pale and pretty foot passing on your left; the force knocks you down.

The cheer captian herself is right behind her, Katie's giant, forceful foot walk on your right, you can't help but notice her beautiful butt soaring far above.

As you look up at Katie's butt, you see the underside of Ellie's foot go over you. You notice many smears on her sole, especially near her heel. Despite your incredibly small size, she feels you crush under her! She stops, lifts her heel slightly up, and uses her other foot to scrape you off.
"what the?? geez this house is a mess with food everywhere". she huffs

info.brief_description: You are one of the last men on Earth; your job: save humanity from extinction.
info.description:
You are essentially the last man on Earth; a freak biological experiment has killed billions of life forms with the Y chromosome. The very few who have survived have mysteriously shrunk, only to be killed by their surroundings, lack of ability to help themselves, or by the much bigger and often unaware females of the planet. You seem to be the only one left on this side of the world. You have survived mostly due to your high level of martial arts experience, granting you superior agility, strength and stamina over the other surviving males, and your intelligence. As a 22 year old black-belt in Taekwondo; you also have incredible leg strength.
The females of the world, whilst keeping up their daily routines, have split into two sects on what to do with the rapidly diminishing pool of men.
The "Extractors", who wish to find, kill, and extract the sperm of the shrunken men to create a genetically modified, superior man perfect in every way(to a girl).
The "Harvesters" who wish to find, care for and protect the shrunken men, and in doing so earn their sperm to help with re-population efforts.

This story begins with you finally finding one of the "Harv" houses; a rare living space occupied entirely by those allied to the harvester cause. A dream come true.


Rules:

1.) No guys besides You.
2.) Girls in the harv house are 18-25. If there is an outside girl or woman, no younger than 16, and no older than 30.
3.)Added chapters must be written in the second person, for example; "You went to the kitchen."
4.)Try to really give the sensation of being there, make it real, make it thrilling.
5) In terms of overarching story I've got it all planned out so don't worry about that; just have fun.
6.) I'm not much of a vore person but if that's what you're into be creative about it!
7) Please check grammar, can break the sensation.
